string.name: name
string.value: The Hidden Truth about the Past
Andy the Time Traveler has requested that you travel to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 to investigate and if possible, destroy the giant robot, if it exists.
You traveled to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 as Andy the Time Traveler has requested, during which time you spotted a giant robot and destroyed it as instructed.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 120,000\r\nCan participate in the "Nex the Time Guard" quest.\r\n

According to the records I found, a giant robot appeared in the year 2099. At the time, this was regarded as a silly rumor, but I have a hunch it's not something we should overlook. Please travel to year 2099 and investigate.
If you get lucky and find the robot, destroy it. Please. For the sake of the future.
This is serious business. If you've lost interest, now would be a good time for you to quit and go about your business.
So? Was there really a giant robot?\r\n#b#L0#Yes, there really was. As you requested, I destroyed it.#l\n#k
You did? Thank you. I wish this were the end to our problem.
Please travel to year 2099 and investigate the robot that appeared in the harbor. If you happen to run into the robot, please destroy it.
